articles.title: Ukraine Russia war live updates: Putin not attending summit in person - USA TODAY
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin won't be shaking hands at a major international summit opening in South Africa because of international charges.
articles.content: Russian President Vladimir Putin won't be shaking hands at a major international summit opening Tuesday in South Africa, discouraged from attending in person because of criminal charges linked to his… [+3715 chars]
